markdown:
**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 134 1.1 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- In its normal form, a _spy staff_ is a slim rod of burnished wood with subtle etchings of eyes upon its sides. The first to develop the _spy staff_ were agents of Andoran's Twilight Talons, but such staves have spread to espionage agencies throughout the Inner Sea region and beyond. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Spy Staff **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 134 1.1 **Price** 340 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_message_](/Spells.aspx?ID=190)
  • **1st** [_illusory disguise_](/Spells.aspx?ID=159), [_invisible item_](/Spells.aspx?ID=700), [_message rune_](/Spells.aspx?ID=581)
  • **2nd** [_humanoid form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=153), _illusory disguise_, [_misdirection_](/Spells.aspx?ID=198)
Spy Staff (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 134 1.1 **Price** 1,175 gp **Bulk** 1 --- The DC to disbelieve the illusion disguising the staff is 32.
  • **3rd** [_clairaudience_](/Spells.aspx?ID=39), _illusory disguise_, [_nondetection_](/Spells.aspx?ID=209)
  • **4th** [_clairvoyance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=40), [_private sanctum_](/Spells.aspx?ID=235)
Spy Staff (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 134 1.1 **Price** 5,300 gp **Bulk** 1 --- The DC to disbelieve the illusion disguising the staff is 38.
  • **5th** [_mind probe_](/Spells.aspx?ID=193), [_prying eye_](/Spells.aspx?ID=239)
  • **6th** [_mislead_](/Spells.aspx?ID=199), [_scrying_](/Spells.aspx?ID=268)
name: Spy Staff
